HOW IT WORKS:
=============
1. User fills out contact form normally
2. Upon submission, reCAPTCHA v3 analyzes user behavior invisibly
3. Security token generated based on verification
4. Form data + token sent to EmailJS service
5. Email delivered to footnoteconsults@gmail.com
6. User receives confirmation message
7. Form automatically clears
